id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [Graphical Display Menu](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/graphical_display_menu.html#overview)*

display.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: ID of the display to render to. See [Drawing Modes](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/graphical_display_menu.html#drawing-modes) for more details

*See also: [Graphical Display Menu](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/graphical_display_menu.html#overview)*

foreground_color.docs:
**[Color](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#config-color)**: Specifies the foreground color to use. Defaults to COLOR_ON

*See also: [Graphical Display Menu](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/graphical_display_menu.html#overview)*

background_color.docs:
**[Color](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#config-color)**: Specifies the background color to use. Defaults to COLOR_OFF

*See also: [Graphical Display Menu](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/graphical_display_menu.html#overview)*
